#summary Definition and properties of field

= Field =

Field is area of world where creatures of populations can do their [Activity activities] 

Every field in the world has some properties (e.g. coordinates) and objects connected with it e.g:
  * stocks of [Articles articles] in fields
  * [Population populations] of [Creature creature] living on fields
  
= Stock =
Field has some space (called stock) to keep articles. Stock has defined by
capacity and cannot hold more articles then their summary volume.
